nodes.label: Find the detailed version of this roadmap along with other similar roadmaps
Have a look at the following related roadmaps
Make sure to learn the "Beginner" topics of the JavaScript roadmap before you start learning React.
There used to be "Class Components" which React doesn't recommend any more. You don't need to learn about them but you might still notice them in some legacy projects
